Kraven the Hunter >

⭐ 7/10 | ☆Rate

In theaters Thursday, Dec. 12

Sony further expands their Spider-Man universe with Aaron Taylor-Johnson starring as Kraven, the big-game hunter and frequent foe of everyone's favorite webslinger. Kraven teases started back in The Amazing Spider-Man 2 when Sam Raimi wanted the entire Sinister Six to make an appearance in the massive Spidey sequel. As you'd expect, everyone involved in the origin story dances around the question of whether Spider-Man will make an appearance in the movie, but Sony has to sense they have an opportunity to generate more enthusiasm for their Marvel movies during the MCU's rebuilding phase.
